entries.decision: Use deny > ask > allow precedence for permission safety
entries.rationale: Deny rules must have highest precedence to block dangerous commands even if they match ask/allow patterns

entries.decision: Put rm:* in ask list with specific dangerous patterns in deny
entries.rationale: This allows safe rm commands (like rm node_modules) with user confirmation, while blocking destructive patterns (rm -rf /) unconditionally
Team-shared settings ensure consistent safety across all users, while personal settings allow customization without affecting others
